creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: black book bound with string; woodblock images of architecture, and various scenes of people, mythical creatures, and Mt. Fuji
markings: square relief seal first page LRC; square relief seals pg. 4-5; Japanese label on cover
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hokusai's Sketchbooks (Hokusai manga 北斎漫画)
title: Transmitting the Spirit and Revealing the Form of Things: Hokusai's Sketchbooks, vol. 5
